description: This table holds the specimen details.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: This column holds the specimen record ID.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column holds the system generated name for the specimen record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to store type of specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPECIMEN_DESC
columns.description: This column stores a short description about the specimen that is being collected.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to store source from where specimen is collected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: This column is used to store unique ID for the specimen.

columns.name: COLL_BY_ID
columns.description: This column is used to store the provider who collected the specimen.

columns.name: COLL_DATE
columns.description: This column is used to store collection date for specimen.

columns.name: COLL_TIME
columns.description: This column is used to store collection time for specimen.

columns.name: DEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to store destination where specimen was sent.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pathology


Microbiology


Cytology


Histology


Radiology


Chemistry

columns.name: TRANSPORTED_BY_ID
columns.description: A free-text description of the method that transported the specimen.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the priority of the specimen when it is sent to the lab.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SENT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date when the requisition was printed using the Specimens section and its copies.

columns.name: SENT_TIME
columns.description: This column stores the time when the requisition was printed using the Specimens section and its copies.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the patient's contact serial number.

columns.name: DELETE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column will hold the reason for deleting the specimen record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Documentation Error


Other

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPD_TM
columns.description: Stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked.

columns.name: FROZEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the specimen is frozen.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SPEC_LABEL_PRT_DTTM
columns.description: The most recent instant that a label was printed for the specimen.  It is updated every time a label is printed for the specimen.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Stores Diagnose Behandel Combinatie (DBC) Episode linked to a specimen in DBC enabled environments.

columns.name: MARKED_AS_SENT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the instant that the specimen is marked as sent to Lab.

columns.name: IN_FIXATIVE_DTTM
columns.description: Enter time when specimen was fixed in fixative (example:formalin). This is applicable only if specimen is indicated as fixed in fixative or fixed in formalin.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the surgical log where this specimen is collected and documented.

columns.name: AUTHRZING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The authorizing provider for orders created for the specimen.

columns.name: CLINICAL_IMPRESSION
columns.description: Free text clinical impressions for the specimen.

columns.name: LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the laterality of the specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Right


Left


Bilateral


Midline


Indeterminate


Both


Not applicable


Not Specified


Other

columns.name: SPECIMEN_WEIGHT
columns.description: This column stores the specimen weight.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate the unit corresponding to the specimen weight documented.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Gram


Kilogram


Ounce


Pound

columns.name: OTHER_REC_CREATE_WF_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store workflows other than specimen navigator which created this record


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Integrated Laboratory System

columns.name: SPECIMEN_SIZE
columns.description: This item is used to document the size of the specimen collected.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_SIZE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate the unit corresponding to the specimen size documented.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SOURCE_MODIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item documents an additional modifier to the specimen's source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CALCIFICATION_SPREADING
columns.description: This column stores the spread of calcification in mm.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_TUMORS
columns.description: This column stores the number of tumors.

columns.name: TUMOR_1_DISTANCE_FROM_PAP
columns.description: This column stores the distance of tumor 1 from the papilla in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_1_SIZE
columns.description: This column stores the size of tumor 1 in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_2_DISTANCE_FROM_PAP
columns.description: This column stores the distance of tumor 2 from the papilla in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_2_SIZE
columns.description: This column stores the size of tumor 2 in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_3_DISTANCE_FROM_PAP
columns.description: This column stores the distance of tumor 3 from the papilla in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_3_SIZE
columns.description: This column stores the size of tumor 3 in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_4_DISTANCE_FROM_PAP
columns.description: This column stores the distance of tumor 4 from the papilla in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_4_SIZE
columns.description: This column stores the size of tumor 4 in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_5_DISTANCE_FROM_PAP
columns.description: This column stores the distance of tumor 5 from the papilla in mm.

columns.name: TUMOR_5_SIZE
columns.description: This column stores the size of tumor 5 in mm.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_VOLUME
columns.description: This column stores specimen volume.

columns.name: SPECIFY_MATERIAL_FT
columns.description: This column stores the material that was removed.

columns.name: ENDOSCOPIC_FINDINGS_FT
columns.description: This column stores the endoscopic findings of a specimen.

columns.name: DISTANCE_TO_BORDER
columns.description: This column stores the distance to the border, in mm.

columns.name: MEDICAL_TREATMENT_FT
columns.description: This column stores the medical treatment needed if necessary.

columns.name: SIZE_OF_TUM_ULTRASOUND
columns.description: The size of the tumor in mm, discovered via ultrasound.

columns.name: SIZE_OF_TUMOR_MAMMOGRAPHY
columns.description: The size of the tumor in mm, discovered via mammography.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_READING
columns.description: This item stores the radiologic reading for a specimen.

columns.name: PRIORITY_DUE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the due date and time for a specimen priority.

columns.name: TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_CORES
columns.description: For needle biopsy procedures, stores the total number of cores taken.

columns.name: NUM_OF_CORES_W_CALCIFICATION
columns.description: For needle biopsy procedures, stores the number of cores taken with calcification.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_ID_STRING
columns.description: Stores a free text ID for research protocols.

columns.name: ID_PREFIX
columns.description: Short name of the group that the specimen falls under (e.g. clinical, pathology, etc.).

columns.name: USER_MOD_SPEC_ID_YN
columns.description:
Flag that stores whether or not a user manually modified the specimen ID.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FROZEN_YN

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ORIENTATION_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the orientation of the specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TISSUE_EXCISION_DTTM
columns.description: Stores when a specimen was excised.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_NUMBER_OF_CONTAINERS
columns.description: Stores the number of containers used for storing the specimen.

columns.name: NEEDLE_GAUGE
columns.description: Stores the gauge of the needle used when retrieving a specimen.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_PASSES
columns.description: Stores the number of passes performed when retrieving a specimen.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_SLIDES
columns.description: Stores the number of slides used when collecting a specimen.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_VISIT
columns.description: Stores the reason for the patient visit as documented on a surgical specimen. This documentation is for reference only and does not update any diagnosis or problem list documentation.

columns.name: DISTANCE_FROM_NIPPLE
columns.description: Stores the distance from the nipple to the specimen collection site.

columns.name: MAN_REL_TO_MYCHRT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the order result of the specimen should be manually released to MyChart.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FROZEN_YN

columns.name: MATERIAL_SUPPLEMENTARY_DESC
columns.description: The supplementary description of the material.

columns.name: PLACENTA_WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the placenta.

columns.name: MEMBRANE_CONDITION
columns.description: The condition of the membrane.

columns.name: MARKING_OF_UMBILICAL_CORD
columns.description: The marking of the umbilical cord.

columns.name: GESTATIONAL_AGE_IN_WEEKS
columns.description: The gestational age in weeks.
